backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles, post records, and infrastructure for chunked media uploads with placeholder handlers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting favicon-related updates and impacted components with associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected one‑sentence summaries of all frontend source files for reference or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind‑based OKLCH color theme defining light/dark mode tokens and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining updated favicon links and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing authentication, profile setup, routing among landing/feed/viewer/upload, and global UI layout.
frontend/src/components/feed/Feed.tsx: Paginated feed that loads posts, shows loading/error states, and provides navigation.
frontend/src/components/feed/PostCard.ts: Displays a post’s media preview, detecting image or video and creating a preview URL.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo, greeting text, and authentication/upload controls using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/Landing.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero video and three orange‑shadow feature cards in a two‑row layout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting for a profile name with input handling and save button state.
frontend/src/components/upload/UploadBut: Simple upload trigger button with an icon.
frontend/src/components/upload/UploadCom: Handles file selection and chunked upload with progress, cancel support, and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/viewer/PostViewe: Displays a full post with media, author checks, sharing, and deletion options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedUpload.ts: Manages chunked file uploads with retries, cancellation, progress tracking, and finalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and posts through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables, including light/dark theme colors and custom UI utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/chunking.ts: Implements file chunking utilities for slicing files, counting chunks, and computing byte ranges.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, favicon-related issues, requirements, and pending feature requests.
